trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of extensions for a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gere uma coleção de extensões para um <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified extension to the collection of extensions.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a extensão especificada para a coleção de extensões.

trans-unit.source: When this overload is used, each workflow instance that requests this extension type will get the extension instance provided to this method.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta sobrecarga é utilizada, cada instância de fluxo de trabalho que este tipo de extensão de pedidos irá obter a instância de extensão fornecida a este método.

trans-unit.source: If each workflow instance should have its own instance of the extension, use the other <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: Se cada instância de fluxo de trabalho deve ter a sua própria instância da extensão, utilize a outra <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma do <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>sobrecargas são denominadas após <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é emitida.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Marks the collection of extensions as read-only.
trans-unit.target: Marca a coleção de extensões como só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a workflow host is prepared for execution.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado quando um anfitrião de fluxo de trabalho é preparado para execução.

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after MakeReadOnly, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma do <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>sobrecargas são denominadas após MakeReadOnly, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é emitida.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>
